definition: the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
details:
noun
- the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
= example: the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
= synonyms: inhibition, forbiddance
- a law forbidding the sale of alcoholic beverages
= example: a law forbidding the sale of alcoholic beverages
- a decree that prohibits something
= synonyms: proscription, ban
- refusal to approve or assent to
- the period from 1920 to 1933 when the sale of alcoholic beverages was prohibited in the United States by a constitutional amendment
= synonyms: prohibition era
